title: Sandwich Varieties Quiz
description: From classic clubs to Vietnamese banh mi — test your knowledge of sandwiches worldwide!

questions.question: The Reuben sandwich traditionally features corned beef, sauerkraut, Swiss cheese, and which dressing?
Banh mi is a sandwich that originated in which country, blending French and local culinary traditions?
A croque-monsieur is a French hot sandwich made with ham and which cheese?
Which Italian sandwich is made with a round bread roll, typically containing cured meats and mozzarella?
A Philly cheesesteak originated in which U.S. city?
Which sandwich, named after a Cuban community, features roast pork, ham, Swiss cheese, pickles, and mustard on Cuban bread?
A club sandwich traditionally has how many layers of bread?
Which British sandwich spread is made from yeast extract and has a famously divisive taste?
A Monte Cristo sandwich is unique because it is prepared in what way?
options: Dipped in egg batter and fried (like French toast)

questions.question: Which Middle Eastern sandwich features falafel or shawarma wrapped in pita bread?
Po' boy sandwiches are a tradition in which U.S. city?
A BLT sandwich consists of which three main ingredients?
Which Scandinavian open-faced sandwich, served on dense rye bread, is called smørrebrød?
A lobster roll is most closely associated with which region of the United States?
Which Mexican sandwich, served on a soft white roll called a telera, is called a torta?
